message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $11,000. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $9,500.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $11,000 represents a fair price for its value, I'm willing to come down to $10,250. This feels like a good compromise.
